wisdom.sentence: A father doesn't destroy his children.
wisdom.author: Lt. Carolyn Palamas, "Who Mourns for Adonais?", stardate 3468.1.

wisdom.sentence: A little suffering is good for the soul.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The Corbomite Maneuver", stardate 1514.0

wisdom.sentence: A man either lives life as it happens to him, meets it head-on and licks it, or he turns his back on it and starts to wither away.
wisdom.author: Dr. Boyce, "The Menagerie" ("The Cage"), stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: A princess should not be afraid -- not with a brave knight to protect her.
wisdom.author: McCoy, "Shore Leave", stardate 3025.3

wisdom.sentence: A star captain's most solemn oath is that he will give his life, even his entire crew, rather than violate the Prime Directive.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The Omega Glory", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: A Vulcan can no sooner be disloyal than he can exist without breathing.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The Menagerie", stardate 3012.4

wisdom.sentence: A woman should have compassion.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Catspaw", stardate 3018.2

wisdom.sentence: Actual war is a very messy business.  Very, very messy business.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "A Taste of Armageddon", stardate 3193.0

wisdom.sentence: After a time, you may find that "having" is not so pleasing a thing, after all, as "wanting."  It is not logical, but it is often true.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Amok Time", stardate 3372.7

wisdom.sentence: All your people must learn before you can reach for the stars.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The Gamesters of Triskelion", stardate 3259.2

wisdom.sentence: Another Armenia, Belgium ... the weak innocents who always seem to be located on a natural invasion route.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Errand of Mercy", stardate 3198.4

wisdom.sentence: Another dream that failed.  There's nothing sadder.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "This side of Paradise", stardate 3417.3

wisdom.sentence: Another war ... must it always be so?  How many comrades have we lost in this way? ...  Obedience.  Duty.  Death, and more death ...
wisdom.author: Romulan Commander, "Balance of Terror", stardate 1709.2

wisdom.sentence: ... bacteriological warfare ... hard to believe we were once foolish enough to play around with that.
wisdom.author: McCoy, "The Omega Glory", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: "Beauty is transitory." "Beauty survives."
wisdom.author: Spock and Kirk, "That Which Survives", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Behind every great man, there is a woman -- urging him on.
wisdom.author: Harry Mudd, "I, Mudd", stardate 4513.3

wisdom.sentence: Blast medicine anyway! We've learned to tie into every organ in the human body but one.  The brain!  The brain is what life is all about.
wisdom.author: McCoy, "The Menagerie", stardate 3012.4

wisdom.sentence: Change is the essential process of all existence.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Let That Be Your Last Battlefield", stardate 5730.2

wisdom.sentence: Compassion -- that's the one things no machine ever had.  Maybe it's the one thing that keeps men ahead of them.
wisdom.author: McCoy, "The Ultimate Computer", stardate 4731.3

wisdom.sentence: Conquest is easy. Control is not.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Mirror, Mirror", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Death, when unnecessary, is a tragic thing.
wisdom.author: Flint, "Requiem for Methuselah", stardate 5843.7

wisdom.sentence: Death. Destruction.  Disease. Horror.  That's what war is all about. That's what makes it a thing to be avoided.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "A Taste of Armageddon", stardate 3193.0

wisdom.sentence: [Doctors and Bartenders], We both get the same two kinds of customers -- the living and the dying.
wisdom.author: Dr. Boyce, "The Menagerie" ("The Cage"), stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Each kiss is as the first.
wisdom.author: Miramanee, Kirk's wife, "The Paradise Syndrome",      stardate 4842.6

wisdom.sentence: Earth -- mother of the most beautiful women in the universe.
wisdom.author: Apollo, "Who Mourns for Adonais?" stardate 3468.1

wisdom.sentence: Either one of us, by himself, is expendable.  Both of us are not.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The Devil in the Dark", stardate 3196.1

wisdom.sentence: Emotions are alien to me.  I'm a scientist.
wisdom.author: Spock, "This Side of Paradise", stardate 3417.3

wisdom.sentence: Even historians fail to learn from history -- they repeat the same mistakes.
wisdom.author: John Gill, "Patterns of Force", stardate 2534.7

wisdom.sentence: Every living thing wants to survive.
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Ultimate Computer", stardate 4731.3

wisdom.sentence: Extreme feminine beauty is always disturbing.
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Cloud Minders", stardate 5818.4

wisdom.sentence: Fascinating is a word I use for the unexpected.
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Squire of Gothos", stardate 2124.5

wisdom.sentence: Fascinating, a totally parochial attitude.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Metamorphosis", stardate 3219.8

wisdom.sentence: First study the enemy. Seek weakness.
wisdom.author: Romulan Commander, "Balance of Terror", stardate 1709.2

wisdom.sentence: Four thousand throats may be cut in one night by a running man.
wisdom.author: Klingon Soldier, "Day of the Dove", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: "... freedom ... is a worship word..." "It is our worship word too."
wisdom.author: Cloud William and Kirk, "The Omega Glory", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Genius doesn't work on an assembly line basis. You can't simply say, "Today I will be brilliant."
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The Ultimate Computer", stardate 4731.3

wisdom.sentence: He's dead, Jim
wisdom.author: McCoy, "The Devil in the Dark", stardate 3196.1

wisdom.sentence: History tends to exaggerate.
wisdom.author: Col. Green, "The Savage Curtain", stardate 5906.4

wisdom.sentence: Humans do claim a great deal for that particular emotion (love).
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Lights of Zetar", stardate 5725.6

wisdom.sentence: I am pleased to see that we have differences.  May we together become greater than the sum of both of us.
wisdom.author: Surak of Vulcan, "The Savage Curtain", stardate 5906.4

wisdom.sentence: I have never understood the female capacity to avoid a direct answer to any question.
wisdom.author: Spock, "This Side of Paradise", stardate 3417.3

wisdom.sentence: I object to intellect without discipline;  I object to power without constructive purpose.
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Squire of Gothos", stardate 2124.5

wisdom.sentence: I'm a soldier, not a diplomat. I can only tell the truth.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Errand of Mercy", stardate 3198.9

wisdom.sentence: I'm frequently appalled by the low regard you Earthmen have for life.
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Galileo Seven", stardate 2822.3

wisdom.sentence: I've already got a female to worry about.  Her name is the Enterprise.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The Corbomite Maneuver", stardate 1514.0

wisdom.sentence: If a man had a child who'd gone anti-social, killed perhaps, he'd still tend to protect that child.
wisdom.author: McCoy, "The Ultimate Computer", stardate 4731.3

wisdom.sentence: If I can have honesty, it's easier to overlook mistakes.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Space Seed", stardate 3141.9

wisdom.sentence: If some day we are defeated, well, war has its fortunes, good and bad.
wisdom.author: Commander Kor, "Errand of Mercy", stardate 3201.7

wisdom.sentence: If there are self-made purgatories, then we all have to live in them.
wisdom.author: Spock, "This Side of Paradise", stardate 3417.7

wisdom.sentence: Immortality consists largely of boredom.
wisdom.author: Zefrem Cochrane, "Metamorphosis", stardate 3219.8

wisdom.sentence: In the strict scientific sense we all feed on death -- even vegetarians.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Wolf in the Fold", stardate 3615.4

wisdom.sentence: Insufficient facts always invite danger.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Space Seed", stardate 3141.9

wisdom.sentence: Insults are effective only where emotion is present.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Who Mourns for Adonais?"  stardate 3468.1

wisdom.sentence: Intuition, however illogical, is recognized as a command prerogative.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Obsession", stardate 3620.7

wisdom.sentence: Is truth not truth for all?
wisdom.author: Natira, "For the World is Hollow and I have Touched      the Sky", stardate 5476.4.

wisdom.sentence: It is a human characteristic to love little animals, especially if they're attractive in some way.
wisdom.author: McCoy, "The Trouble with Tribbles", stardate 4525.6

wisdom.sentence: It is more rational to sacrifice one life than six.
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Galileo Seven", stardate 2822.3

wisdom.sentence: It is necessary to have purpose.
wisdom.author: Alice #1, "I, Mudd", stardate 4513.3

wisdom.sentence: It is undignified for a woman to play servant to a man who is not hers.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Amok Time", stardate 3372.7

wisdom.sentence: It would be illogical to assume that all conditions remain stable
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Enterprise" Incident", stardate 5027.3

wisdom.sentence: It would be illogical to kill without reason
wisdom.author: Spock, "Journey to Babel", stardate 3842.4

wisdom.sentence: It would seem that evil retreats when forcibly confronted
wisdom.author: Yarnek of Excalbia, "The Savage Curtain", stardate 5906.5

wisdom.sentence: Killing is stupid; useless!
wisdom.author: McCoy, "A Private Little War", stardate 4211.8

wisdom.sentence: Killing is wrong.
wisdom.author: Losira, "That Which Survives", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Knowledge, sir, should be free to all!
wisdom.author: Harry Mudd, "I, Mudd", stardate 4513.3

wisdom.sentence: Landru! Guide us!
wisdom.author: A Beta 3-oid, "The Return of the Archons", stardate 3157.4

wisdom.sentence: Leave bigotry in your quarters; there's no room for it on the bridge.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Balance of Terror", stardate 1709.2

wisdom.sentence: "Life and death are seldom logical." "But attaining a desired goal always is."
wisdom.author: McCoy and Spock, "The Galileo Seven", stardate 2821.7

wisdom.sentence: Live long and prosper.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Amok Time", stardate 3372.7

wisdom.sentence: Lots of people drink from the wrong bottle sometimes.
wisdom.author: Edith Keeler, "The City on the Edge of Forever",      stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Love sometimes expresses itself in sacrifice.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Metamorphosis", stardate 3220.3

wisdom.sentence: Madness has no purpose.  Or reason.  But it may have a goal.
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Alternative Factor", stardate 3088.7

wisdom.sentence: Many Myths are based on truth
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Way to Eden",  stardate 5832.3

wisdom.sentence: Men don't talk peace unless they're ready to back it up with war.
wisdom.author: Col. Green, "The Savage Curtain", stardate 5906.4

wisdom.sentence: Men of peace usually are [brave].
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Savage Curtain", stardate 5906.5

wisdom.sentence: Men will always be men -- no matter where they are.
wisdom.author: Harry Mudd, "Mudd's Women", stardate 1329.8

wisdom.sentence: Military secrets are the most fleeting of all.
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Enterprise Incident", stardate 5027.4

wisdom.sentence: Most legends have their basis in facts.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "And The Children Shall Lead", stardate 5029.5

wisdom.sentence: Murder is contrary to the laws of man and God.
wisdom.author: M-5 Computer, "The Ultimate Computer", stardate 4731.3

wisdom.sentence: No more blah, blah, blah!
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Miri", stardate 2713.6

wisdom.sentence: No one can guarantee the actions of another.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Day of the Dove", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: No one may kill a man. Not for any purpose.  It cannot be condoned.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Spock's Brain", stardate 5431.6

wisdom.sentence: No one wants war.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Errand of Mercy", stardate 3201.7

wisdom.sentence: No problem is insoluble.
wisdom.author: Dr. Janet Wallace, "The Deadly Years", stardate 3479.4

wisdom.sentence: Not one hundred percent efficient, of course ... but nothing ever is.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Metamorphosis", stardate 3219.8

wisdom.sentence: Oblivion together does not frighten me, beloved.
wisdom.author: Thalassa (in Anne Mulhall's body), "Return to Tomorrow",      stardate 4770.3.

wisdom.sentence: Oh, that sound of male ego.  You travel halfway across the galaxy and it's still the same song.
wisdom.author: Eve McHuron, "Mudd's Women", stardate 1330.1

wisdom.sentence: One does not thank logic.
wisdom.author: Sarek, "Journey to Babel", stardate 3842.4

wisdom.sentence: One of the advantages of being a captain is being able to ask for advice without necessarily having to take it.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Dagger of the Mind", stardate 2715.2

wisdom.sentence: Only a fool fights in a burning house.
wisdom.author: Kank the Klingon, "Day of the Dove", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Our missions are peaceful -- not for conquest. When we do battle, it is only because we have no choice.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The Squire of Gothos", stardate 2124.5

wisdom.sentence: Our way is peace.
wisdom.author: Septimus, the Son Worshiper, "Bread and Circuses",      stardate 4040.7.

wisdom.sentence: Pain is a thing of the mind.  The mind can be controlled.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Operation -- Annihilate!" stardate 3287.2

wisdom.sentence: Peace was the way.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The City on the Edge of Forever", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Power is danger.
wisdom.author: The Centurion, "Balance of Terror", stardate 1709.2

wisdom.sentence: Prepare for tomorrow -- get ready.
wisdom.author: Edith Keeler, "The City On the Edge of Forever",      stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Punishment becomes ineffective after a certain point.  Men become insensitive.
wisdom.author: Eneg, "Patterns of Force", stardate 2534.7

wisdom.sentence: Respect is a rational process
wisdom.author: McCoy, "The Galileo Seven", stardate 2822.3

wisdom.sentence: Schshschshchsch.
wisdom.author: The Gorn, "Arena", stardate 3046.2

wisdom.sentence: Sometimes a feeling is all we humans have to go on.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "A Taste of Armageddon", stardate 3193.9

wisdom.sentence: Sometimes a man will tell his bartender things he'll never tell his doctor.
wisdom.author: Dr. Phillip Boyce, "The Menagerie" ("The Cage"),      stardate unknown.

wisdom.sentence: Star Trek Lives!
Suffocating together ... would create heroic camaraderie.
wisdom.author: Khan Noonian Singh, "Space Seed", stardate 3142.8

wisdom.sentence: Superior ability breeds superior ambition.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Space Seed", stardate 3141.9

wisdom.sentence: "That unit is a woman." "A mass of conflicting impulses."
wisdom.author: Spock and Nomad, "The Changeling", stardate 3541.9

wisdom.sentence: "The combination of a number of things to make existence worthwhile." "Yes, the philosophy of 'none,' meaning 'all.'"
wisdom.author: Spock and Lincoln, "The Savage Curtain", stardate 5906.4

wisdom.sentence: The face of war has never changed.  Surely it is more logical to heal than to kill.
wisdom.author: Surak of Vulcan, "The Savage Curtain", stardate 5906.5

wisdom.sentence: The heart is not a logical organ.
wisdom.author: Dr. Janet Wallace, "The Deadly Years", stardate 3479.4

wisdom.sentence: The idea of male and female are universal constants.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Metamorphosis", stardate 3219.8

wisdom.sentence: The joys of love made her human and the agonies of love destroyed her.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Requiem for Methuselah", stardate 5842.8

wisdom.sentence: The man on tops walks a lonely street; the "chain" of command is often a noose.
The more complex the mind, the greater the need for the simplicity of play.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Shore Leave", stardate 3025.8

wisdom.sentence: ... The prejudices people feel about each other disappear when then get to know each other.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Elaan of Troyius", stardate 4372.5

wisdom.sentence: The sight of death frightens them [Earthers].
wisdom.author: Kras the Klingon, "Friday's Child", stardate 3497.2

wisdom.sentence: The sooner our happiness together begins, the longer it will last.
wisdom.author: Miramanee, "The Paradise Syndrome", stardate 4842.6

wisdom.sentence: There are always alternatives.
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Galileo Seven", stardate 2822.3

wisdom.sentence: There are certain things men must do to remain men.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The Ultimate Computer", stardate 4929.4

wisdom.sentence: There are some things worth dying for.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Errand of Mercy", stardate 3201.7

wisdom.sentence: There is a multi-legged creature crawling on your shoulder.
wisdom.author: Spock, "A Taste of Armageddon", stardate 3193.9

wisdom.sentence: There is an order of things in this universe.
wisdom.author: Apollo, "Who Mourns for Adonais?" stardate 3468.1

wisdom.sentence: There's a way out of any cage.
wisdom.author: Captain Christopher Pike, "The Menagerie" ("The Cage"),      stardate unknown.

wisdom.sentence: There's another way to survive.  Mutual trust -- and help.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Day of the Dove", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: There's no honorable way to kill, no gentle way to destroy.  There is nothing good in war.  Except its ending.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln, "The Savage Curtain", stardate 5906.5

wisdom.sentence: There's nothing disgusting about it [the Companion].  It's just another life form, that's all. You get used to those things.
wisdom.author: McCoy, "Metamorphosis", stardate 3219.8

wisdom.sentence: "There's only one kind of woman ..." "Or man, for that matter.  You either believe in yourself or you don't."
wisdom.author: Kirk and Harry Mudd, "Mudd's Women", stardate 1330.1

wisdom.sentence: This cultural mystique surrounding the biological function -- you realize humans are overly preoccupied with the subject.
wisdom.author: Kelinda the Kelvan, "By Any Other Name", stardate 4658.9

wisdom.sentence: Those who hate and fight must stop themselves -- otherwise it is not stopped.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Day of the Dove", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Time is fluid ... like a river with currents, eddies, backwash.
wisdom.author: Spock, "The City on the Edge of Forever", stardate 3134.0

wisdom.sentence: To live is always desirable.
wisdom.author: Eleen the Capellan, "Friday's Child", stardate 3498.9

wisdom.sentence: Too much of anything, even love, isn't necessarily a good thing.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The Trouble with Tribbles", stardate 4525.6

wisdom.sentence: Totally illogical, there was no chance.
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Galileo Seven", stardate 2822.3

wisdom.sentence: Uncontrolled power will turn even saints into savages. And we can all be counted on to live down to our lowest impulses.
wisdom.author: Parmen, "Plato's Stepchildren", stardate 5784.3

wisdom.sentence: Violence in reality is quite different from theory.
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Cloud Minders", stardate 5818.4

wisdom.sentence: Virtue is a relative term.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Friday's Child", stardate 3499.1

wisdom.sentence: Vulcans believe peace should not depend on force.
wisdom.author: Amanda, "Journey to Babel", stardate 3842.3

wisdom.sentence: Vulcans do not approve of violence.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Journey to Babel", stardate 3842.4

wisdom.sentence: Vulcans never bluff.
wisdom.author: Spock, "The Doomsday Machine", stardate 4202.1

wisdom.sentence: Vulcans worship peace above all.
wisdom.author: McCoy, "Return to Tomorrow", stardate 4768.3

wisdom.sentence: Wait!  You have not been prepared!
wisdom.author: Mr. Atoz, "Tomorrow is Yesterday", stardate 3113.2

wisdom.sentence: War is never imperative.
wisdom.author: McCoy, "Balance of Terror", stardate 1709.2

wisdom.sentence: War isn't a good life, but it's life.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "A Private Little War", stardate 4211.8

wisdom.sentence: We do not colonize.  We conquer.  We rule.  There is no other way for us.
wisdom.author: Rojan, "By Any Other Name", stardate 4657.5

wisdom.sentence: We fight only when there is no other choice.  We prefer the ways of peaceful contact.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Spectre of the Gun", stardate 4385.3

wisdom.sentence: We have found all life forms in the galaxy are capable of superior development.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The Gamesters of Triskelion", stardate 3211.7

wisdom.sentence: We have phasers, I vote we blast 'em!
wisdom.author: Bailey, "The Corbomite Maneuver", stardate 1514.2

wisdom.sentence: "We have the right to survive!" "Not be killing others."
wisdom.author: Deela and Kirk, "Wink of An Eye", stardate 5710.5

wisdom.sentence: We Klingons believe as you do -- the sick should die.  Only the strong should live.
wisdom.author: Kras, "Friday's Child", stardate 3497.2

wisdom.sentence: What kind of love is that?  Not to be loved; never to have shown love.
wisdom.author: Commissioner Nancy Hedford, "Metamorphosis",      stardate 3219.8

wisdom.sentence: "What terrible way to die." "There are no good ways."
wisdom.author: Sulu and Kirk, "That Which Survives", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Where there's no emotion, there's no motive for violence.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Dagger of the Mind", stardate 2715.1

wisdom.sentence: Witch! Witch! They'll burn ya!
wisdom.author: Hag, "Tomorrow is Yesterday", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Without facts, the decision cannot be made logically.  You must rely on your human intuition.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Assignment: Earth", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Without followers, evil cannot spread.
wisdom.author: Spock, "And The Children Shall Lead", stardate 5029.5

wisdom.sentence: Without freedom of choice there is no creativity.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The return of the Archons", stardate 3157.4

wisdom.sentence: Women are more easily and more deeply terrified ... generating more sheer horror than the male of the species.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Wolf in the Fold", stardate 3615.4

wisdom.sentence: Women professionals do tend to over-compensate.
wisdom.author: Dr. Elizabeth Dehaver, "Where No Man Has Gone Before", stardate 1312.9.

wisdom.sentence: Worlds are conquered, galaxies destroyed -- but a woman is always a woman.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "Conscience of the King", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: Worlds may change, galaxies disintegrate, but a woman always remains a woman.
wisdom.author: Kirk, "The Conscience of the King", stardate 2818.9

wisdom.sentence: Yes, it is written.  Good shall always destroy evil.
wisdom.author: Sirah the Yang, "The Omega Glory", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: You are an excellent tactician, Captain.  You let your second in command attack while you sit and watch for weakness.
wisdom.author: Khan Noonian Singh, "Space Seed", stardate 3141.9

wisdom.sentence: You can't evaluate a man by logic alone.
wisdom.author: McCoy, "I, Mudd", stardate 4513.3

wisdom.sentence: You Earth people glorified organized violence for forty centuries.  But you imprison those who employ it privately.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Dagger of the Mind", stardate 2715.1

wisdom.sentence: You humans have that emotional need to express gratitude.  "You're welcome," I believe, is the correct response.
wisdom.author: Spock, "Bread and Circuses", stardate 4041.2

wisdom.sentence: You!  What PLANET is this!
wisdom.author: McCoy, "The City on the Edge of Forever", stardate 3134.0

wisdom.sentence: You're dead, Jim.
wisdom.author: McCoy, "Amok Time", stardate 3372.7

wisdom.sentence: You're dead, Jim.
wisdom.author: McCoy, "The Tholian Web", stardate unknown

wisdom.sentence: You're too beautiful to ignore.  Too much woman.
wisdom.author: Kirk to Yeoman Rand, "The Enemy Within", stardate unknown
